Contact
We are always looking for motivated students with a passion for scientific research. Funding permitted, positions are available for individuals of all education levels. If you are interested in joining our lab, please email your cover letter, CV, and transcript to: placeholder@email.ca.

You can also find us in the Life Sciences Institue at UBC Vancouver
    Address:

    Life Sciences Centre
    2350 Health Sciences Mall
    University of British Columbia
    Vancouver, BC, V6T 1Z3, Canada
